title: PLEASE HELP! ACCOUNT HAS BEEN HACKED AND BANNED
body:
I have been out of the country, and i recently returned to my account being banned. Is there anyway i can appeal this? 
Can't RIOT see the change in IP login location, does that not matter at all? 
Does my past behavior not defend me in anyway shape or form?
I am baffled by this and have no idea what to do. Please Help.

Thank you,

Van

replies.body: We'd be happy to look into this and give context.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll help with your specific issue individually.  It may take a bit depending on the size of our queue, but we'll reply asap!
